The International Convention Centre (ICC)

The ICC’s location in the centre of Birmingham, with its excellent road, rail and air links, makes it one of the busiest conference venues in Europe.

International Convention Centre (ICC)
Broad Street
Birmingham
B1 2EA

For further information please see links to the ICC website:

Find the ICC

Accessibility information

Birmingham City Centre Map

Discount on Virgin train travel

We are delighted to offer delegates a 25% discount on Virgin train travel to the conference when booking an advanced fare. To receive the discount please book your journey via the booking link. Please note, you must show confirmation of conference attendance to receive the discount.
